trg_text: Medium Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS) Cabinet welcomes the maiden MTBPS by Finance Minister Tito Mboweni, which is based on the strong conviction that South Africa can be renewe The 2018 MTBPS highlights the difficult economic and fiscal choices confronting government over the next three year Economic growth for 2018 has been revised down from

xa Phuresidente na pulani ya ku hlukela, leswi swi nga ta seketeriwa hi ntshamiseko wa nkwama wa timali wa mfumo na wa timalMfumo wu tama wa ha tibohile eka ku yiseka emahlweni ka swa nkwama wa timali wa mfumo, kambe ku vile na ku rheta kusukela loko ku andlariwile Mpimanyeto wa 2018 nan wak Mfumo wu tama wa ha tibohile ku tshamisekisa na ku hunguta xikwelet Ehenhla ka xiyimo xa mbangu wo tika wa ikhonomi na nkwama wa timali wa mfumo, ku aviwa loku ringanyetiwaka ka xibalo ku ya emahlweni ku rhangise minongonoko yo tirhisa mali leyi seketelaka dyondzo ya masungulo, rihanyu, ku hanya kahle ka vaaki, mati, nkululo na vukorhokeri bya gezi Samiti ya swa Rihanyu ya PhuresidenteKhabinete yi amukela mivuyelo ya Samiti ya swa Rihanyu ya Phuresidente leyi yi nga na xikongomelo xa ku tirhana na mitlhontlho yo hambanahambana leyi langutaneke na sisiteme ya swa rihanyu ra vaak Mivuyelo yi ta tiyisa ku lulamiseriwa ka ntirhiso wa Ndzindzakhombo wa swa Rihanyu wa Rixaka Mpfuxeto wa misavaKhabinete yi amukela ntirho lowu fananaka wa minongonoko ya mpfuxeto wa misava na ntlheriso wa timfanelo lowu lulamisaka nkavululami wa karhi lowu nga hundza na ku pfuna ku kurisa ikhonomPhuresidente Cyril Ramaphosa u rhangele ntirho wa ntlheriso wa timfanelo ta misava, laha kutlula 4 586 wa tihekitara ta misava ti nyikiweke muganga wa KwaMkhwanazi eEmpangeni, KwaZulu-NataMuganga wa KwaMkhwanazi wu ta tlhela wu kuma mipako ya le ndzhaku ka ku tshamisekisiwa na nseketelo lowu nga ta va pfuna ku fikisa eka mpimo wa le henhla rifuwo leri nga kotekaka ra misava ley Leswi swi cinca vaakandhawu kusuka eka vurimelakhwiri kuya eka vatekaxiave va swa mabindzu na vini va mabindzu eka nkhuluko wa nkoka hinkwawo wa rifuwo leri nga eka emisaveni ya vonMfumo wa tiboha ku seketela ku yiseka emahlweni ka mabindzu ya swa vurimi lama ha tumbulukaka, lama katsaka 262 wa tiphurojeke leti fambelanaka na mpfuxeto wa misava ku vuyerisa vantshwa na vavasati eswifundzenikulu hinkwaswo Ku onheteriwa ka swimakiwakulu swa mfumoKhabinete yi kombise ku vilela eka ku onheteriwa ka swimakiwakulu swa vutleketl Leswi swi yisa ehansi vutiboheleri bya mfumo bya ku yisa vukorhokeri emigangeni leyi a yi nga byi kumi kusukela khale na khal Ku hava mpimo wa nhlundzuko wu faneleke ku vanga ku onheteriwa ka nhundzu ya mfum Ku onheteriwa kwaloko ku tirha ku pfumata lava sweleke vukorhokeri lebyi dingiwaka swonghasKhabinete yi kombela vaaki ku rhiya tihlo na ku tirhisana na tiejensi ta nsindziso wa nawu ku endla leswaku lavaya va nga na vutihlamuleri va tihlamulel Khabinete yi ya emahlweni yi lemuka leswaku Ntlawa wa Vululami, Nsivelo wa Vugevenga na Nsirhelelo wu tirhana na mhaka leyi hilaha swi faneleke hakona Endlelo ra ku thoriwa ka Mulawuri wa Vuchuchisi bya Mfumo wa Vaaki (NDPP)Khabinete yi amukele endlelo lerintshwa ra ku thoriwa ka NDP Phuresidente Ramaphosa u thole Phanele yo Tsundzuxa ku kuma na ku endla tiinthavhiyu na vanhu lava nga na nkoka wa ku tekeriwa enhlokweni ku teka xiyimo xa Nhloko ya Vulawuri byo Chuchisa bya Rixak Phanele leyi yi hlengeletane ro sungula vhiki reri naswona yi languteriwa ku rhumela mavito ya lava nghenisiweke eka nxaxamelo wo koma eka Phuresidente ku nga si hundza siku ra 7 N wendzamhala 201 Vuahluri bya Khoto ya VumbiwaKhabinete yi burisanile hi Vuahluri bya Khoto ya Vumbiwa hi ku tirhisiwa, ku rimiwa na ku va na mbangi hi ntswatsi eka ku yi tirhisela swa le xihundleni swa yena n wini na nhlohlotelo wa yon Vaaki va komberiwa ku
trg_text: to , and the global environment remains challenging for emerging market economie The 2018 MTBPS gives effect to the President s growth economic stimulus and recovery plan, which will be underpinned by fiscal and monetary stabilit Government remains committed to fiscal sustainability, but there has been slippage since the tabling of the 2018 Budget in February this yea Government remains committed to stabilizing and bringing down deb Against the backdrop of a difficult economic and fiscal environment, the proposed division of revenue continues to prioritise large social spending programmes that support basic education, health, social welfare, water, sanitation and electricity services Presidential Health Summit Cabinet welcomes the outcomes of the Presidential Health Summit which aim to address the various challenges facing the public health syste The outcomes will strengthen the preparations for the implementation of the National Health Insurance

src_text: endla va tiva hi vuahluri lebyi tanihileswi ntirhiso wa mbangi endhawini ya mani na mani wu tshimbisiwek Ku ya emahlweni, vuahluri lebyi a byi susangi vugevenga bya ku xavisa mbangKhabinete yi amukela vuahluri lebyi nga kona eka mbangu wa milawu yin wana leyi yi nga ha tirhisiwaka eka ntirho, ku va na mbangi na ku rima mbang Khabinete yi le ku kumeni ka switsundzuxo eka mhaka leyi Samiti ya Vuhlayiseki bya SwikoloKhabinete yi amukela Samiti ya Vuhlayiseki bya Xikolo leya ha ku Khomiwaka ku nga ri khale leyi rhurheriweke ehansi ka vurhangeri bya Holobye wa Dyondzo ya Masungulo Angie Motshekg Samiti leyi yi tise endhawini yin we dyondzo na vakhomaxiave va le handle ku kuma switshunxo swa swiphiqo swa vuhlayiseki leswi langutaneke na swikolo swa tiko xikan we na ku khulela ndlela ku ya emahlweni ku va na mbangu lowu hlayisekeke eswikolwenLeswi swi landzela timhangu ta madzolonga eswikolweni swin wana, ku katsa na rifu ro vava ra mudyondzisi wa 24 wa malembe hi vukhale, Ttn Gadimang Daniel Mokolobate, loyi a tlhaviweke hi mudyondzi eka Xikolo xa Sekondari xa Ramotshere eZeerust, N walungu-VupeladyambVakhomaxiave hinkwavo va twananile leswaku madzolonga hi ku angarhela, naswona exikolweni ngopfungopfu, a ya amukeleki na leswaku ntirhisano wo yisa emahlweni wa laveka ku tiyisisa leswaku swikolo swi va swi hlayisekile swinene eka havumbirhi bya vadyondzi na vadyondzisi Swikambelo swa matiriki Khabinete yi navelela vadyondzi hinkwavo, ngopfungopfu vadyondzi va Giredi ya 12, leswinene eka nkarhi low I ro sungula, ndzawulo nan waka yi ta tlhela yi fambisa swikambelo hi Ririmi ra Swikoweto ra Afrika-Dzonga eka levhele ya Ririmi ra le Kaya eka 58 wa vakamberiwa lava nga twiki eswikolweni swa 10 hinkwasw Xikambelo xi famba ku ringana mavhiki ya ntlhanu na hafu naswona xi ta hela hi siku ra 28 HukurVadyondzi etikweni hinkwaro va ta tlhela va sayina xihlambanyo hi ku lava ka vona xa ku tiboha ku hlayisa vunene bya swikambelo hi ku nga teki xiave eka mitirho yo homboloka yihi kumbe yih Vatswari na vahlayisi va khutaziwa ku seketela vadyondzi hi nkarhi lowu wa nkoka swonghasi eka rendzo ra vona ra tidyondz Swi tlhela swi va swa nkoka swonghasi ku hlohlotela vadyondzi ku heta ku dyondza xikol Swiboho swa Khabinete9.
trg_text: Cabinet is taking advice on the matter School Safety Summit Cabinet welcomes the recently held School Safety Summit hosted under the leadership of Basic Education Minister Angie Motshekg The summit brought together education and external stakeholders to find solutions to safety issues facing the country s schools as well as to pave the way forward for safer environments in school This follows incidents of violence at some schools, including the tragic death of the 24-year-old teacher, Mr Gadimang Daniel Mokolobate, who was fatally stabbed by a learner at the Ramotshere Secondary School in Zeerust, North Wes All stakeholders agreed that violence in general, and in schools in particular, is not acceptable and that further cooperation is required to ensure that schools become safer for both learners and teachers Matric exams Cabinet wishes all learners, especially Grade 12 learners, well over this perio For the first time, the department will this year also administer an examination in South African Sign Language at Home Language level to 58 deaf candidates across 10 school The examination extends over five-and-a-half weeks and will conclude on 28 Novembe Learners across the country will also sign a voluntary pledge to commit to upholding the integrity of the examinations by not participating in any malpractic Parents and guardians are encouraged to support learners during this critical period in their academic journe It is also vital to motivate learners to finish their schoolin Cabinet decisions9.

src_text: wa Afrika-Dzonga ku Herisa ku Endliwa ka Mananga, ku Hungutiwa ka Nono ka Misava na ku Hunguta Switandzhaku swa Dyandza (2018-2030).
trg_text: Cabinet approved South Africa s Revised and Aligned Second National Action Programme (NAP) to Combat Desertification, Land Degradation and Mitigate the Effects of Drought (2018-2030).

src_text: NAP yi lava ku hoxa xandla eka nhlayiso na ntirhiso lowu yisekaka emahlweni wa misava ya hina na swipfuno swin wana swa ntumbulukAfrika-Dzonga yi pfumerile Ntsombano wa Vun we bya Tinxaka wa ku Herisa ku Endliwa ka Mananga hi 1997.
trg_text: The NAP seeks to contribute towards the conservation and sustainable use of our land and other natural resourceSouth Africa ratified the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification in 1997.

src_text: Hi ku fambisana na Atikili ya 9 ya ntsombano, mavandla ya laveka ku hluvukisa, ku lulamisa na ku tirhisa NAP tanihi xiphemukulu xa qhinga ra ku herisa ku endliwa ka mananga na ku hunguta switandzhaku swa dyandz Afrika-Dzonga yi hluvukise NAP ya yona yo sungula hi 2004.
trg_text: In accordance with Article 9 of the convention, parties are required to develop, prepare and implement a NAP as the central element of the strategy to combat desertification and mitigate the effects of drough South Africa developed its first NAP in 2004.

src_text: Khabinete yi pasise nkandziyiso wa Nawumbisi wo Hundzuluxa wa Vana eka Gazete ya Mfumo leswaku vaaki va nyika mavonel Nawumbisi lowu wu lava ku tiyisa ntirhisano wa sisiteme ya nhlayiso wa vana na nsirhelelo hi ku tirhisa ntirhisano wa le xikarhi ka tindzawulo na le xikarhi ka tisekitarMihundzuluxo leyi yi ta angula eka Vuahluri bya Khoto ya le Henhla ya Gauteng N walungu bya Hukuri 2017, laha eka byona Ndzawulo ya Nhluvukiso wa Vanhu yi leriseke ku lulamisiwa na ku tivisiwa ka mihundzuluxo leyi faneleke ya Nawu wa Vana, 2005, (Nawu wa 38 wa 2005) hi mayelana na xitshunxo xa xinawu eka malawulelo ya sisiteme ya nhlayiso na vuwundl Khabinete yi pasise ku andlariwa ka Nawumbisi wo Hundzuluxa wa Vukorhokeri bya Poso ePalamend Nawumbisi lowu wu humelerisa Papila ra Swibumabumelo swa Mfumo ra Pholisi ya ICT leyi Pfanganisiweke ya Rixaka leyi yi pasisiweke hi Khabinete hi Ndzati 2016.Mivuyelo leyi kunguhateriweke yi fanele ku va na Hofisi ya Poso ya Afrika-Dzonga
trg_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the Children s Amendment Bill in the Government Gazette for public comment The Bill seeks to strengthen coordination of the child-care and protection system through interdepartmental and intersectoral collaboratio The amendments respond to the North Gauteng High Court Judgement of November 2017, wherein the Department of Social Development was ordered to prepare and introduce the necessary amendments to the Children s Act, 2005 (Act 38 of 2005) in respect to the legal solution towards the management of the foster-care syste Cabinet approved the introduction of the Postal Services Amendment Bill to Parliamen The Bill gives effect to the National Integrated ICT Policy White Paper that was approved by Cabinet in September 2016.The intended outcomes are to have a competitive, viable and sustainable South African Post Office that provides/facilitates universal services and access as well as the transformation of the postal secto The Bill also provides an approach to assigning physical addresses to rural and traditional communitieThis Bill has already gone through public consultatio Upcoming events13.

src_text: Khomferense ya Vuvekisi bya Matiko ya Misava ya Afrika-DzongaPhuresidente Ramaphosa hi Ravuntlhanu, 26 Nhlangula 2018, u ta va mutshamaxitulu wa Khomferense ya Vuvekisi leyi simekiwaka ya Afrika-Dzonga eSandton Convention Centre eJon Lexi i xiphemu xa nkatsano wa matshalatshala ya ku koka vuvekisi na ku kurisa ikhonomi ya hinHi ku engetela, varhumiwa va vuvekisi va mune lava va thoriweke hi Phuresidente va ta vuyisa xiviko eka khomferense hi ndzima leyi khatsiwek Samiti ya Ntlawa wa Makumembirhi (G20)Phuresidente Ramaphosa u rhambiwile hi Chanselara wa Xifederali wa Jarimani, Dkd Angela Merkel ku teka xiave eka Samiti ya Vuvekisi ya G20
trg_text: South African International Investment ConferencePresident Ramaphosa will on Friday, 26 October 2018, preside over South Africa s inaugural Investment Conference at the Sandton Convention Centre in Johannesbur This is part of a combination of efforts to attract investments and grow our econom Additionally, the four investment envoys who were appointed by the President will report back to the conference on progress mad Group of Twenty (G20) SummitPresident Ramaphosa has been invited by the Federal Chancellor of Germany, Dr Angela Merkel, to participate in the G20 Investment Summit

src_text: Mabindzu ya Jarimani na Matiko ya Ntwanano na Afrika (CwA), na Nhengeletano ya Mabindzu, leswi havumbirhi swi nga ta khomeriwa eBerlin, Jarimani hi siku ra 30 Nhlangula 2018.
trg_text: German Business and the Compact with Africa (CwA) Countries, and a Business Roundtable, both of which will be held in Berlin, Germany on 30 October 2018.The G20 Investment Summit will bring together German business and CwA Countries to explore investment opportunities under the framework of the G20 Partnership with Afric German investors will present flagship projects currently undertaken in the CwA Countries and explore further opportunities on the continen The President will attend the summit in the capacity of Co-Chair of the G20 Africa Advisory GrouThe G20 Conference on the CwA will focus on ways in which the G20, African countries and development institutions can cooperate to promote private investment and economic participation in African state The meeting will also undertake preparatory work in this field for the G20 Summit in Buenos Aires, Argentin National Imbizo Focus WeekMembers of the Executive will participate in the GCIS s 9th National Imbizo Focus Week of the fifth democratic administration, which will take place from 12 to 25 November 2018.

src_text: Samiti ya Vuvekisi ya G20 yi ta tisa endhawini yin we mabindzu ya Jarimani na Matiko ya CwA ku valanga swivandlanene swa vuvekisi ehansi ka rimba ra Xinakulobye xa G20.
trg_text: The crime thriller set in the Cape Flats was funded by the Department of Trade and Industry through its South African Emerging Black Filmmakers Incentive schem This will contribute in attracting foreign direct investment into the South African film industrCondolences19.

src_text: Vavekisi va Jarimani va ta nyika tiphurojeke ta nkoka swinene leti nga ku endlekeni eka nkarhi wa sweswi eka Matiko ya CwA na ku valanga swivandlanene ku yisa emahlweni eka tikokul Phuresidente u ta ya eka samiti a ri eka xiyimo xa Mutshamaxitulukulobye wa Ntlawa wo Tsundzuxa wa Afrika wa G20.Khomferense ya G20 eka CwA yi ta kongomisa eka tindlela leti G20, matiko ya Afrika na mihlangano ya nhluvukiso swi nga tirhisanaka hatona ku kondletela vuvekisi lebyi nga riki bya mfumo na vutekaxiave bya ikhonomi eka mifumo ya Afrik Nhlengeletano leyi yi ta tlhela yi endla ntirho wo lulamisela eka xiyenge xa Samiti ya G20 eBuenos Aires, Argentin Vhiki ra Nkongomiso wa Xivijo xa RixakaSwirho swa Vurhangerinkulu swi ta teka xiave eka Vhiki ra Nkongomiso wa Xivijo xa Rixaka xa mafambiselo ya xidemokirasi ya vuntlhanu, leri ri nga ta va kona kusuka hi siku ra 12 kufika 25 Hukuri 2018.
trg_text: Cabinet congratulates the Minister of Health, Dr Aaron Motsoaledi, who received two prestigious Kochon prizes, at an award ceremony held at The Hague, The Netherland The first prize is in the Minister s individual capacity for his role and political leadership in the fight against tuberculosis (TB) globallThe second prize, which the Minister will share with the Right Honourable Nick Hebert, Member of Parliament (MP) in the United Kingdom, will be in their capacity as co-chairs of the Global TB Caucus of MPs from all over the worl The Kochon Prize is awarded annually to individuals and/or organisations that have made a significant contribution to combating TB either in their countries or globall Cabinet welcomes the World Travel Awards 2018 which voted South Africa as Africa s Leading Destinatio Durban in KwaZulu-Natal was also recognised as Africa s Leading City Destination and scooped the prestigious title of Africa s Leading Cruise Por Cape Town, in the Western Cape landed the title of Africa s Leading Festival and Event Destinatio Cabinet welcomes the premiering of a local film titled Nommer 37 by film-maker Joshua Bradley in the United States on 2 November 2018.

src_text: Leswi swi kotlana na Vhiki ro Vika ra Nongonoko wa Matirhelo wa KhabinetVhiki ra Nkongomiso wa Xivijo ri ta nyika pulatifomo eka swirho swa Vurhangerinkulu bya Rixaka xikan we na varhangeri va mfumo wa swifundzakulu na wa miganga ku endla tinhlengeletano ta miganga na Swivijo etikweni hinkwaro, hi nkarhi lowu, ku kombisa ntirho wa mfumo wa Rimba ra Maqhinga ra le Xikarhi ka Theme na ku angula eka timhaka leti boxiwaka hi vaakatiko, leswiMavhiki mambirhi ya vugingiriki ya ta va kona ehenhla ka xiyimo xa mitlangelo ya malembexidzana mifungho ya Nyimpi yo Lwela Ntshunxeka Manana Albertina Sisulu na Tatana Nelson Mandela, lava havumbirhi bya vona va kombisaka nkoka wa vutihlanganisi na n wangulano na miganga leyi va yi korhokelek
trg_text: This coincides with the Cabinet Programme of Action Reporting Wee The Imbizo Focus Week will provide a platform for members of the National Executive as well as provincial and local government leaders to undertake community meetings and Izimbizo countrywide, over this period, to demonstrate government s implementation of the 2014-2019 Medium Term Strategic Framework and to respond to issues being raised by citizens, which impact on the safety, growth and development of our communitieThe two weeks of activism takes place against the backdrop of celebrations of the centenaries of Struggle icons Mama Albertina Sisulu and Tata Nelson Mandela, both of whom epitomised the value of regular consultation and interaction with the communities they serve

src_text: Khabinete yi hoyozele Holobye wa swa Rihanyu, Dkd Aaron Motsoaledi, loyi a kumeke masagwati ya Kochon ya xiyimo xa le henhla mambirhi, eka nkhuvu wa masagwati lowu khomeriweke eThe Hague, Netheland Sagwati ro sungula ri le ka xiyimo xa munhu a ri yexe xa Holobye xa xiave xakwe na vurhangeri bya xipolitiki eka ku lwisana na rifuva (TB) emisaveni hinkwaySagwati ra vumbirhi, leri Holobye a nga ta ri avelana na Muchavisekinkulu Nick Hebert, Xirho xa Palamende (MP) eUnited Kingdom, ri ta va eka xiyimo xa vona tanihi vatshamaxitulukulobye va Khokhasi ya TB ya Misava Hinkwayo ya tiMP to huma emisaveni hinkway Sagwati ra Kochon ri ta nyikiwa lembe na lembe eka vanhu na/kumbe mihlangano leyi yi endleke vuhoxaxandla byo tivikana eka ku herisa TB ku nga va ematikweni ya ka vona kumbe emisaveni hinkway Khabinete yi amukela Masagwati ya ku Tekiwa ka Tendzo Emisaveni ya 2018 laha ku vhotiweke Afrika-Dzonga tanihi Ndhawu leyi Endzeriwaka leyi Rhangeke Emahlwen Durban eKwaZulu-Natal na yona yi tekeriwile enhlokweni tanihi Ndhawu leyi Endzeriwaka ya Madorobakulu leyi Rhangeke Emahlweni naswona hi tekile xidlodlo xa xiyimo xa le henhla xa Hlaluko wa Swikepe lowu Rhangeke Emahlweni wa Afrik Kapa, eKapa-Vupeladyambu yi kume xidlodlo xa Ndhawu leyi Endzeriwaka ya Mikhuvu na Swiendleko leyi Rhangeke Emahlweni ya Afrik Khabinete yi amukela ku rhanga emahlweni ka filimi ya laha tikweni leyi thyiweke Nommer 37 hi muendli wa tifilimi Joshua Bradley eUnited States hi siku ra 2 Hukuri 2018.
trg_text: Mtshaliat the passing of ANC stalwart Moss Chikan Mr Chikane became an MP in 1994 after the country's first democratic election In 2005, he was appointed as South Africa s Ambassador to Germanyto the people of Sweden as well as the family of Lisbet Palme

src_text: Khabinete yi tikatse na Phuresidente Ramaphosa eka ku hundzisa ku tsana na michavelelo:1eka ku lova ka kutlula 27 wa vanhu, eka nghozi ya swipandzamananganyingi eka N1 N walungu eLimpop Vatirhisi va magondzo va khutaziwa ku va na vukheta emagondzweni ya hina na ku tiyisisa leswaku va landzelela milawu ya gondzo hi mikarhi hinkwayoka ku lova ka mfungho wa Nyimpi yo Lwela Ntshunxeko, Manana Agnes Msiman Manana Msimang a ri mugingirikeli wa rimbewu loyi a tinyiketeleke tlhelo Xandla xa Phuresidente ya Ligi ya Vamanana ya African National Congres
trg_text: Cabinet joins President Ramaphosa in expressing sadness and condolences:1 at the tragic passing away of more than 27 people, in a multiple vehicle accident on the N1 North in Limpop Road users are urged to exercise caution on our roads and must ensure that they obey the rules of the road at all timesat the passing of Struggle icon, Mama Agnes Msiman

src_text: A ri exikarhi vavasati va ntsandzavahlayi lava va hlohloteleke miganga ya ka vona eAfrika-Dzonga hinkwayo ku lwisana na sisiteme ya xihlawuhlaw U ta lahliwa hi Ravuntlhanu, 26 Nhlangul Ntirho wa nkosi wu ta sungula hi 08:00 eOur Lady of Cedars Catholic Church eWoodmead, Jonika ku lova ka nghwazi ya Nyimpi yo Lwela Ntshunxeko tlhelo muamukeri wa Risiva ra Rixaka ra Mendi eka Xitiyanhlana xa Silivhere, Ttn Eric

trg_text: Constitutional Court JudgementCabinet deliberated on the Constitutional Court Judgement on the use, cultivation and possession of cannabis by an adult person in private for his/her personal consumption and its impac Members of the public are requested to familiarise themselves with the judgement as the use of cannabis in a public place is prohibite Furthermore, the judgement did not decriminalise the dealing in cannabiCabinet acknowledges that the judgement exists in the context of other laws which may be applicable to the use, possession and cultivation of cannabi

src_text: Ku thoriwa hi vuntshwa ka Mnn Gugulethu Brightness Nokukhanya (Poppy) Khoza tanihi Mulawuri: Vuhahisi bya Vaaki bya Huvo ya Vulawuri bya Vuhahisi bya Vaaki bya Afrika-Dzong Dkd Molefi Motuku tanihi Muofisirinkulu wa Vurhangerinkulu wa Mintek (nhlangano wa ndzavisiso wa swicelwa wa rixaka wa Afrika-Dzonga).
trg_text: National Director of Public Prosecutions (NDPP) appointment process Cabinet welcomed the new approach of appointing the NDP President Ramaphosa appointed the Advisory Panel to identify and conduct interviews with individuals worthy of consideration to occupy the position of the Head of the National Prosecuting Authorit The panel convened for the first time this week and is expected to submit shortlisted names to the President by 7 December 2018.
